name: Panic Party
description:
Mikkey is an average college student who has one problem...they have Panic Disorder! Somehow they were convinced to go to a house party full of classmates. Can you navigate the party without giving Mikkey a panic attack? Explore the perils of social anxiety in Panic Party!

This game was made in two weeks by Eric Tofsted for a college course. It's Eric's first time coding a game, with the help of the Ren'Py Engine. He is excited to continue exploring this medium further!
